last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: Lana is faced with an impossible decision when she is kidnapped by the terror cell. A choice between her duty and saving those who matter the most to her.

name: Trigger Point
overview: For London's bomb disposal experts, no day is ever the same as they risk their lives protecting the city from harm.
tagline: Death is just a heartbeat away.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Bomb disposal officers Lana Washington and Joel Nutkins are called out to a Met counter-terrorism operation at a London housing estate to investigate a potential bomb factory and suspected bomb-maker Andy Phelan.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: As the bombing campaign intensifies, so do inter-community tensions as the far-right group English Flag take to the streets to blame Islamists for the attack.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A far-right group called the Crusaders claim responsibility for the mosque attack. Lana finds a forensic link between the bomb at the mosque and the one at Westhaven - were they both bombed by the same person?

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Following the murder of a Counter Terrorism officer, Lana Washington and the EXPO team race against time to stop the bombers before they strike again.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Lana struggles to come to terms with her personal loss, and her failure to prevent the explosion. Meanwhile, Counter Terrorism officers identify the bomber and launch a massive manhunt.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The EXPO team are stretched to breaking point dealing with a complicated device planted at the Campaign HQ of the Progressive Alliance. Lana tells Karl she wants to break up.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Expo Lana Washington is giving a routine talk, having just returned from secondment, when an explosion rocks the heart of the city. But is she ready to return to active duty?

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The police launch an investigation to find the bombers, whose skill and sophistication keeps them one step ahead. Under pressure to get results, Helen makes a breakthrough.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: As the team mourns Thom's death, a new lead emerges - an informant, promising intelligence on the terror cell. Meanwhile a journalist is sent a suspicious package.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Alex contacts the police with critical information about a new attack planned for that day, but Commander Francis warns the team against placing too much trust in him.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Lana breaks protocol to try to help Alex, knowing he has nobody else to turn to. Then the team makes a shock discovery about the terror cell they’re tracking down.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Lana is faced with an impossible decision when she is kidnapped by the terror cell. A choice between her duty and saving those who matter the most to her.
